data.text:
The big reveal! Thousands of students across the planet made brilliant science videos for this year’s Breakthrough Junior Challenge. We surprised the winner in class with the life-changing news. @salkhanacademy @StationCDRKelly @khanacademy
https://t.co/ttYWx6pybZ

Biggs always knew @kanyewest was a star, from day one.

And for that confidence, @1996Biggs & Roc-A-Fella were rewarded with “one of the most amazing albums” that he’d ever heard with College Dropout.

Hear more on a new episode of #TheETCs w/ @KDTrey5 → https://t.co/Ren6XXWVX0 https://t.co/dOL21PRzgX
More to come... ICYMI ⬇️ @NBA2K https://t.co/vGv3xJ1yJt

Season 3 of @NBA2KMobile is here 🔥

The first 50 people to hit Redeem in NBA 2K Mobile and enter “KDSEASON3” will get my Sapphire card https://t.co/fNYaxxGJMF

Thanks @Spotify for naming #TheETCs w/ @KDTrey5 as one of the best pods of 2020! #SpotifyWrapped 

https://t.co/5Nf4Ib0Exq

.@curtismartin talks about what motivates him in business, from earning money in order to give back more to the community to learning to save for future ventures.

New episode of #OutOfOffice w/ @richkleiman out now on all podcast platforms: https://t.co/T4GVCIOR7x https://t.co/04ffYmHaj9
HYPEBEAST spoke to the two-time NBA champion about his aspirations for the game's development, his favorite player in 2K to play with besides himself and more. https://t.co/j8FsRKXE8s

Time to get to work @NBA2K 

More info —> @boardroom https://t.co/vGv3xJ1yJt
🔥🔥 @MasterDynamic https://t.co/jTbEJ7GVsE

What's @Tonal and how are elite and amateur athletes using it?

Founder @aorady discusses his journey to building Tonal,  having the Tonal system available for NBA players in the Orlando bubble, the company's future growth, & more.

Full interview → https://t.co/S4UknyGodd https://t.co/mIMbb0Hey8

How do @USMAN84kg and @KDTrey5 deal with opponents who try to get under their skin? Or a hostile arena and still perform at a high level? 

To them, that’s what separates the good from the elite.

Listen to #TheETCs ➡️ https://t.co/H51AggDImz https://t.co/sFjMrtNgWk
New pod ep with @USMAN84kg https://t.co/e4Zov4GKYC https://t.co/GAvAUFhX88

"I learn from the street... I'm not going to go to get an MBA from f****** Harvard" - @garyvee talks about the advantage of street smarts over the Ivy League on a new episode of #OutOfOffice with @richkleiman. 

Listen/Subscribe → https://t.co/hB2Znz3scD https://t.co/GtNOcFIEmh
.@MixedByAli dropped gems this week on the ETCs...https://t.co/b5epsV2QZq https://t.co/YeRDyoOQ5Q

🚨 #OutOfOffice Ep 15 w/ @atptour tennis pro @NickKyrgios

- Kyrgios talks about the difference between hoops & tennis culture/biz
 - Overcoming depression & looking towards the future
- What the sport's "old guard" misunderstands about him + more

LISTEN: https://t.co/viPrhLjCTX https://t.co/kF4sKMMijp

What does the future of racing look like post-COVID? @NYRR SVP of Partnerships Christine Burke joins us to talk about how the org has grown far beyond the @nycmarathon, how they've helped keep runners around the 🌎 moving virtually, & more. 

Full 📹→ https://t.co/QmqeTdL3Ju https://t.co/FrM6pQNC6g
